20775.en:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>Heheheheheheh. Hey there Armamentalist Corps,
I have some good news about your little
monster issue.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20775.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「ガハハハハッ。よう　魔法戦士団。
　例の魔物の件だが　朗報だぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20775.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>: 으하하하하. 이봐, 마법 전사단.
　그 마물 문제 말이다만, 좋은 소식이 있다.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20775.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈！嗨，魔法战士团，
关于那怪物的事情，我有好消息了。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20775.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈！嗨，魔法戰士團，
關於那怪物的事情，我有好消息了。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20776.en: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Oh? What did you find out?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20776.ja: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「何か　わかったのか？<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20776.ko: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 뭔가 알아냈나?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20776.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>知道什么了吗？<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20776.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>知道什麼了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20777.en:
We spotted a Pogoin' Penguin in an area far from its typical habitat. We followed the creature and found a cave nearby where
many of them have gathered.
20777.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「タップペンギーを　棲息地から
　遠く　はなれた場所で目撃し　後をつけて
　やつらが集まる洞くつを　発見しました。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20777.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>: 서식지와 떨어진 곳에서
　탭 펭기를 발견해 뒤따라갔다가
　놈들이 모인 동굴을 찾았습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20777.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>我在离踢踏企鹅栖息地
很远的地方发现它们，于是跟在它们后面，
找到它们聚集的洞窟。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20777.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>我在離踢踏企鵝棲息地
很遠的地方發現牠們，於是跟在牠們後面，
找到牠們聚集的洞窟。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20778.en:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>This particular cave is a completely
unsuitable place for them to live. It's highly
unlikely that they migrated there on their own.<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20778.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>「そこは　彼らが暮らすには
　まったく　適していない場所です。
　自然に　そこへ移動するなど　ありえません。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20778.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>: 그곳은 탭 펭기가 서식하기에
　적합한 환경이 아닙니다.
　자연적으로 그곳으로 이동했을 리 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20778.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>那个环境
根本不适合它们生存，
它们一定不是自然迁徙到那里的。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20778.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01473 _normal m00001>那個環境
根本不適合牠們生存，
牠們一定不是自然遷徙到那裡的。<stop_lip_animation n01473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20779.en:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>...That's just my point. If they didn't migrate
there then how did they get there?<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20779.ja: <start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「……ということだ。どう見る？　魔法戦士団。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20779.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>: ……그렇다는군.
　어떻게 생각해? 마법 전사단.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20779.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>……就是这么一回事。魔法战士团，你们怎么看？<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20779.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>……就是這麼一回事。魔法戰士團，你們怎麼看？<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20780.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Are you trying to say that there's some
other force at work here, Zeiner?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20780.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「魔物を動かした　なんらかの要因があると
　言いたいのか　ザイナー？<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20780.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 마물을 움직이게 만든 원인이 있다고
　말하고 싶은 건가, 자이너?<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20780.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>你是想说有什么原因
让怪物迁徙到了那里吗？扎伊纳。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20780.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>你是想說有什麼原因
讓怪物遷徙到了那裡嗎？札伊納。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20781.en:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>Perhaps. I think we should begin a full-scale
investigation. Maybe we could have the
Armamentalist Corps  join us for a change.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20781.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「かもしれん。本格的に調査を始めたい。
　たまには　魔法戦士団も
　オレらの仕事に　加わろうって気はないか？<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20781.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>: 가능성은 있지. 제대로 조사해 봐야 해.
　마법 전사단도 가끔은
　우리 쪽 임무를 거드는 게 어때?<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20781.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>有可能，我希望正式展开调查。
你们魔法战士团要不要
偶尔也来加入我们的工作？<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20781.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>有可能，我希望正式展開調查。
你們魔法戰士團要不要
偶爾也來加入我們的工作？<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20782.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Let's have <pc> take this one.
I think they're the right person for the job.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20782.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「ここは　<pc>を行かせましょう。
　適任かと　思われます。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20782.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 이번에는 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 보내죠.
　이 친구가 적임자라고 봅니다.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20782.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>那就交给<pc>吧，
我认为他很适合。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20782.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>那就交給<pc>吧，
我認為他很適合。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20783.en:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>If you are willing to help, head to the Water
Circle of the Juleria Underground Mine. Noran
from the Verinard Guard will meet you there.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20783.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「……お前らに　手伝う気があるなら
　ジュレリア地下廃坑の　水環の間へ来い。
　衛士団からは　ノーランが行く。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20783.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>: ……도와줄 마음이 있다면
　주렐리아 지하 폐광에 있는 수환의 방으로 와.
　위사단에서는 노란을 보낼 거다.<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20783.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>……你们如果想帮忙，
就到玖莱利亚地下废坑的水环之室吧。
卫士团会派诺兰过去。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20783.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>……你們如果想幫忙，
就到玖萊利亞地下廢坑的水環之間吧。
衛士團會派諾蘭過去。<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20784.en:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>If noone else shows up we'll have to start
the investigation on our own. That's all there
is to it. Now if you'll excuse me!<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20784.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>「誰も来なくても　調査は　開始するからな。
　言いたいことは以上だ。失礼するぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20784.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>: 아무도 안 보내도 조사는 시작할 거야.
　할 말은 이게 다다. 그럼 실례하지!<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20784.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>就算没人来，我们也会开始调查。
我要说的就是这些。告辞！<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20784.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01487 _normal m00001>就算沒人來，我們也會開始調查。
我要說的就是這些。告辭！<stop_lip_animation n01487 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20785.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>Have you heard story, <pc>?
The report is fascinating. Your task will
be a simple one. <stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「<pc>。話は聞いていたな？

20785.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 얘기는 들었겠지?
　이 보고가 신경 쓰이는 건 사실이다.
　자네가 이 임무를 맡아 줘야겠어.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20785.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><pc>，你都听到了吧？

20785.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><pc>，你都聽到了吧？

20786.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>You are to determine the cause of the Pogoin'
Penguin's erratic behavior. Your main objective
is to investigate. Do you accept this task?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「タップペンギーの　異常行動の

20786.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 탭 펭기의 이상 행동의

20786.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>去查清踢踏企鹅
出现异常行为的原因。

20786.zh-Hant:

20788.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 주레섬의 주렐리아 지하 폐광으로 잠입하고

20788.zh-Hant:

20789.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 이런……. 자네는
　이미 많은 임무를 맡고 있군.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20789.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>唔……閣下似乎已經接下了很多工作。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20790.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>As an Armamentalist you must learn to focus

<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「魔法戦士は　ひとつの任務に

20790.ko:

20790.zh-Hant:

20794.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>What are you waiting for?
Why don't you just become an armamentalist?<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「……いいかげん　魔法戦士になる決心を

20835.zh-Hans:

说起来，阁下似乎还不太了解诺兰。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20835.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>諾蘭那傢伙還是老樣子。
說起來，閣下似乎還不太瞭解諾蘭吧。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20836.en:
There was once a terrible incident called the Armamentalist Corps' greatest mission. Monster organized
itself and attacked towns all over the world.
20836.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「……かつて　魔法戦士団にとって
　最大の任務と呼ばれる　ひどい事件があった。
　魔物が組織となって　世界中の町を襲ったのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20836.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: ……과거에 마법 전사단 최대의 임무라
　불렸던 끔찍한 사건이 있었다. 마물이 조직을
　이뤄 전 세계의 도시를 습격했었지.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20836.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>……过去曾发生过一场惨案，
当时那也是魔法战士的首要任务。
怪物有组织地袭击了全世界的城镇。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20836.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>……過去曾發生過一場慘案，
當時那也是魔法戰士的首要任務。
怪物有組織地襲擊了全世界的市鎮。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20837.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Verinard was also targeted at that
time, and one town was destroyed by
the monster. It was Noran's hometown.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20837.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「その時は　このヴェリナードも標的となり
　あるひとつの町が　魔物に壊滅させられた。
　……ノーランの故郷だった町だ。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20837.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 그때 이곳 베리나드도 표적이 됐고
　한 마을이 마물에게 궤멸되고 말았다.
　……바로 노란의 고향이지.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20837.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>当时威里纳德也是它们的目标，
有一座城镇被怪物摧毁了。
……那里正是诺兰的故乡。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20837.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>當時威里納德也是牠們的目標，
有一座市鎮被怪物摧毀了。
……那裡正是諾蘭的故鄉。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20838.en:
His mother died in the incident. His father, an armamentalist, was in another country on a mission and could
not help the family.
20838.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「やつの母は　その事件で亡くなり……。
　魔法戦士だった父は　任務で他の国にいて
　家族を助けることが　できなかった。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20838.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 그 사건으로 노란의 어머니가 죽었지만…….
　마법 전사였던 아버지는 임무로 외국에 있어
　가족들을 구하러 올 수 없었다.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20838.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>他的母亲在那场动乱中去世……
而他身为魔法战士的父亲
当时在外国执行任务，没法拯救家人。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20838.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>他的母親在那場動亂中去世……
而他身為魔法戰士的父親
當時在外國進行任務，沒辦法拯救家人。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20839.en:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>Noran may have survived, but this
incident has dampened his resolve to
become an armamentalist.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20839.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>「ノーランは　死なずに済んだが
　この出来事が　あやつの
　魔法戦士になる決心を　鈍らせているのだ。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20839.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>: 노란은 가까스로 살아남았지만
　그 사건이 마법 전사가 되겠다는
　노란의 결심을 꺾어 버리고 말았지.<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20839.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>诺兰虽然逃过一劫，
但这件事动摇了
他成为魔法战士的决心。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20839.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01486 _normal m00001>諾蘭雖然逃過一劫，
但這件事動搖了
他成為魔法戰士的決心。<stop_lip_animation n01486 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20840.en:
. Thanks for the assignment. I will have to contact the other armentalists and work out a way
to prevent a deal.
20840.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「<pc>。任務　ご苦労だった。
　私は　他の魔法戦士に連絡を取り
　取り引きを防ぐ策を　練らねばならない。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20840.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 임무 고생 많았다.
　나는 다른 마법 전사들과 연락을 취해서
　거래를 막을 방법을 마련해야 해.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20840.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><pc>，任务辛苦了。
我还得和其他魔法战士取得联系，
想出办法阻止交易。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20840.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001><pc>，任務辛苦了。
我還得和其他魔法戰士取得聯絡，
想出辦法阻止交易。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20841.en:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>I need some time. Continue your
training to become a more graceful
fundamentalist.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20841.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>「しばらく　時間がほしい。
　貴公は　さらに　優美たる魔法戦士を目指し
　修行を続けてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20841.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>: 당분간 시간을 내기 어려울 거다.
　자네는 더욱 우아한 마법 전사로
　성장할 수 있도록 수련을 계속하도록.<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20841.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>我需要一点时间。
阁下就继续努力修行，
成为更加优雅的魔法战士吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20841.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01485 _normal m00001>我需要一點時間。
閣下就繼續努力修行，
成為更加優雅的魔法戰士吧。<stop_lip_animation n01485 CLOSE_MOUTH>
